item.title: DRT Bus Experience Design for Tourists
item.description: Introduction This project is a group work with three other students. Team Leader: Xiangyu Xiao (me) Team members: Jingkun Wei Mengze Cai Rhys Taylor As the team leader, I am responsible for the overall project management, data analysis, determining the main features, prototype iteration, and video production. Jingkun Wei is responsiblefor the user reseach, Mengze Cai is responsible for making the prototype, user evaluation and reflection, Rhys Taylor is responsible for the design book.
